Package controller

Class ChangePasswordController

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
controller.ChangePasswordController
public class ChangePasswordController extends Controller
Logical Layer of the ChangePasswordView
Handles the Process of changing and confirming the Password

    • isEachFieldValid

      private boolean isEachFieldValid(String oldPassword, String newPassword, String newPasswordConfirmation)
      Validates each Field in the View, combines the Validation Errors and warns the User with an alert box created with the AlertCreator
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - The old password, to make sure that it's not empty
      newPassword - The new password, to make sure it's not empty and 8 chars long
      newPasswordConfirmation - The new confirm Password, to make sure it's not empty and equals the new Password
      Returns:
      boolean if the fields are valid

    • isOldPasswordCorrect

      private boolean isOldPasswordCorrect(String oldPassword)
      Checks if the given 'Old Password' matches to the users password hash
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - the password that was typed in to change the password
      Returns:
      boolean if the typed in password is correct

    • closeStage

      private void closeStage()
      executes clearAndResetFields() and closes stage
